\begin{center}
    Schematic (one stage, 3 $T_{p}$ / 1 $T_{n}$ stacked, 6 $T$ total)
    \begin{figure}[h]
        \begin{center}
            \begin{circuitdiagram}{32}{26}
                % ---- '*PA' pmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{penh*}{6}{10}{R}{}{$*_{PA}$}
                \pin{3}{11.5}{L}{A}
                % ---- '*PB' pmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{penh*}{6}{16}{R}{}{$*_{PB}$}
                \pin{3}{17.5}{L}{B}
                % ---- '*PC' pmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{penh*}{6}{22}{R}{}{$*_{PC}$}
                \pin{3}{23.5}{L}{C}
                 \power{8}{25}{U}{}
                % ---- '*NA' nmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{nenh*}{6}{4}{R}{$*_{NA}$}{}
                \pin{3}{2.5}{L}{A}
                % ---- '*NB' nmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{nenh*}{14}{4}{R}{$*_{NB}$}{}
                \pin{11}{2.5}{L}{B}
                % ---- '*NC' nmos pattern ----
                \trans[\wireUD{0.5}]{nenh*}{22}{4}{R}{$*_{NC}$}{}
                \pin{19}{2.5}{L}{C}
                \ground{8}{1}{D}
                \ground{16}{1}{D}
                \ground{24}{1}{D}
                % ---- output pattern ----
                \pin{28}{7}{R}{Z}
                \wire{24}{7}{27}{7}
                \wire{8}{7}{24}{7}
            \end{circuitdiagram}
        \end{center}
    \end{figure}
\end{center}
